ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] the goblin alchemist
ygData.msgSnippet: Nono... his spawn POINT spawns every 72-80 minutes.  The alchemist, a veteran, sentry, or a lookout will spawn.  The alchemist is the rare spawn at that spawn
ygData.messageBody:
Nono... his spawn POINT spawns every 72-80 minutes. The alchemist, a
veteran, sentry, or a lookout will spawn. The alchemist is the rare spawn
at that spawn point.

In Misty, go to the single hut goblin camp. He shares the spawn point with
Mooto. It's the one just inside the hut. This is generally a 2-4 hour
camp. The goblin captain and gelatinous cube I think are on 20min spawns,
but I don't think they have placeholders.. i.e.: they always spawn.
Locations, I'm not too sure of, as they were pulled to the zone for me. :)
Alchemist in Misty is about the same level as the one in Runny. The goblin
captain is around level 22 or 23 I think, and so is the goblin captain.

They always have the quest items.

> From: "Nick Gee" <nick_gee@...>
>
> First I'd like to thank everyone on responding to my post, you've
> been a great help all of you. But I've already spent a while camping
> him. He's meant to span every 72-80 minutes? cause I'd NEVER seen him
> and i've spent a couple of lvl's in there from 16-18 and now a while
> there and he never seems to spawn! Also when you kill him does he
> drop the humerus handled mace every time?
> What about the other mobs? Can you provide information for them liek
> the where they spawn and the times and lvl's etc? Cause I haven't
> spent much time in misty or runneyeye.
> Thanks again in advance,
>
> Aedir Swiftstriker
